Title: Sinai, St. Catherine’s Monastery, Syriac NF M 37, UTO 3
Related: All three undertext objects belong to a single Old Syriac Gospel manuscript, of which the undertext of Syr NF 39 is also part; fol. 1v is followed by Syr NF 39, fol. 9, and fol. 6r is preceded by Syr NF 39, fol. 16v.
Foliation: The two folios are not contiguous. Folios in order of reconstructed undertext: 1r, 1v, 6r, 6v.
Page layout: Number of lines is irregular, ranging from 26 to 30
